text: OJSC "Baikal Airlines" () was an airline based in Irkutsk, Russia. It was founded in 1991 and liquidated in 2001.Information about Baikal Airlines at the Aviation Safety Network Baikal Airlines Tupolev Tu-154M at Beijing-Capital ==Fleet== The Baikal Airlines fleet included Antonov An-24, Antonov An-26 and Tupolev Tu-154 aircraft, as well as a leased Boeing 757 operated from 1994 to 1996. == Accidents and incidents == ==References== Category:Defunct airlines of Russia Category:Companies based in Irkutsk Category:Airlines established in 1991 Category:Former Aeroflot divisions Category:Airlines disestablished in 2001 Category:1991 establishments in Russia
title: Baikal Airlines
